contents: 5. fol. 25b-26b: al-Durar al-ghawālī fī al-aḥādīth al-ʻawālī.
7. fol. 27b-30a: Qalāʼid al-nuḥūr min jawāhir al-buḥūr.
9. fol. 45a: Hādhihi dāʼirah min Dīwān Ibn Sūdūn.
15. fol. 77b-79a: [Chart explaining the Syrian Christian calendar].
17. fol. 87a-94b: Ṣayḥat al-būm fī ḥawādith al-Rūm.
18. fol. 95a-108b: [Extracts, charts, and notes, some concerning magic].
extent: 108 leaves : paper ; 199 x 146 mm. bound to 200 x 149 mm.
subject: Calendars—Middle East—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
